shortDescription: Arris TR3300 v1.0.13 were discovered to contain a command injection vulnerability in the ddns function via the ddns_name, ddns_pwd, h_ddns„ÄÅddns_host parameters. This vulnerability allows attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a crafted request.
vulnerabilityName: commscope arris_tr3300_firmware Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
